title: BOTH SOLD!!! FS: T206 HOBE FERRIS & HEINIE WAGNER-Both SGC!

posts.post_title: BOTH SOLD!!! FS: T206 HOBE FERRIS & HEINIE WAGNER-Both SGC!
posts.post_content:
BOTH SOLD


10-26: FERRIS LOWERED TO $59 
           WAGNER LOWERED TO $55

2 New selections from the Roy Mellinger Collection, which is dwindling down to the last 15 cards or so!

N54 thread re: [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=118774&highlight=t206[/url]

(1) T206 HOBE FERRIS ST LOUIS BROWNS P150/25 SGC 50 VG/EX 4! 

This is an SUPERIOR EXAMPLE of HOBE FERRIS, infielder for the ST LOUIS BROWNS. EYE APPEAL is 2nd to NONE, for sure! LARGE SNOW WHITE BORDERS & NICE SQUARED CORNERS are evident, along w/ a BEAUTIFULLY COLORFUL picture in FULL, CLEAR FOCUS. SPOTLESS F & B--AN OVERALL WONDERFUL T206!  $69 DELIVERED!

(2) T206 HEINIE WAGNER BAT LEFT RED SOX SC150/25 SGC 40 VG 3!

This is a BEAUTIFUL EXAMPLE of HEINIE WAGNER, infielder for the BOSTON RED SOX. VIRTUALLY SPOTLESS F & B, w/ LARGE PURE WHITE BORDERS & SHARPLY SQUARED CORNERS.  Features a very FULL COLOR picture in CLEAR FOCUS. $64 DELIVERED

PM/EM me if interested in 1 or both! I will take all mail in order by time-stamp.

Thanks for looking--These are 2 Classy, Well Preserved T206's w/ a neat provenance.
1st bump! You are looking @ 2 beautiful cards w/ a fantastic pedigree!
Both of these GORGEOUS cards are just sitting there! Either one fits any collection, & then some!!
Just reduced both cards one more time!!!
